(min. 10 innings pitched)

Sophomore pitcher Derek Yoo is the only pitcher in the top 10 with a sub-5 ERA, as well as a below league-average FIP. This suggests that unlike the other pitchers in the top 10, Yoo projects to be an above league-average pitcher.
